caption.center: David B. GINTER, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, Appellee.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Fayette Circuit Court, Criminal Branch, Fourth Division; L. T. Grant, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Perry R. White, Jr., Lexington, for appellant.
Ed Hancock, Atty. Gen., Kenneth A. Howe, Jr., Asst. Atty. Gen., Frankfort, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
PER CURIAM denying motion for appeal.[fn*]
[fn*] Opinion ordered not to be published.Page 710
